title: Kokavila Transmission Tower proudly stands once again after 21 years
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) Kokavila (Kokavil) multi-purpose transmission tower commissioned for the nation by President Mahinda Rajapaksa today on 06 June 2011. Kokavila Rupavahini transmission tower which was first constructed in 1982 to facilitate the people in the North to view television broadcast clearly, destroyed by Tamil Tiger terrorists…
